price: 70. Telle est la faveur d’Allah, et Allah suffit comme Sachant Tout.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
